      • matches

        public static boolean matches(Resource resource,
              List<String> queries)
        Check whether the given resource matches the given list of queries. Queries are interpreted according to RFC 6690, section 4.1, with the important difference that more than one query can be passed to the function. The resource only matches the list of queries if the resource matches every query in the list. This functionality is required to implement resource directory filtering according to the Resource directory draft, which requires support for matching multiple attributes.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to match.
        queries - The list of queries to match the resource with.
        Returns:
        True if the resource matches all queries, false otherwise.

      • parse

        public static Set<WebLink> parse(String linkFormat)
